definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Beauty is life when life unveils her holy face.
sentences.chinese: 當生命摘去遮蓋她聖潔面容的面紗時，美就是生命。

sentences.english: Sue's face lighted up when she heard the good news.
sentences.chinese: 聽到這個好消息時，蘇流露出愉快的面容。

sentences.english: Helen was attracted by Paris" lovely face."
sentences.chinese: 海倫被帕利斯可愛的面容迷住。

sentences.english: Seething Hatred II Forces your opponent to attack you for 5 attacks. Increases your Dreadful Countenance.
sentences.chinese: 迫使目標攻擊你5次，提高恐懼面容等級。

sentences.english: Can a good appearance be a competitive advantage?
sentences.chinese: 較好的面容會成爲一種競爭優勢嗎？

sentences.english: The women who are not so charming, but are smart well-behaved women think we are only after our desire.
sentences.chinese: 面容平平但是聰明文雅的女孩認爲我們爲欲驅使。

sentences.english: Fascination added to your face from day and night.
sentences.chinese: 令你由日到夜都能爲你的面容增添光彩。

sentences.english: Fright drained all colour from his face.
As tears well up, the clearest vision is the face of God.
sentences.chinese: 淚凝滿眶之際，看得最清楚的，是禰的面容。

sentences.english: And Cain was very wroth , and his countenance fell.
sentences.chinese: 和該隱是非常憤怒，他的面容下跌。

sentences.english: The street expose the lonely face.
sentences.chinese: 街道袒露出它孤獨的面容。

sentences.english: Her face was pinched with grief.
sentences.chinese: 她的面容因悲傷而憔悴。

sentences.english: He had a bluff, rough-and-ready face.
His face was irradiated by happiness.
The handsome man acts the part of the hero.
sentences.chinese: 他那英俊的面容陰沈沮喪。

sentences.english: Do you hope to have your face  carved upon 50 ft of  granite rock?
sentences.chinese: 你希望自己的面容被雕刻在50英尺高的花崗岩上嗎？
